Report-Modal-Message.Confirmation-message: Thank you for letting us know. Your comments are important to help us protect our community of Wiinser.  If you have posted the profile of a user or a page, but we believe that it does not violate the community rules, you have other means at your disposal to manage your experience on Espace-Piin's in the best possible way.

1.1: Any description, photographic or written, of sexual acts. Nudity is allowed only if the sexual attributes, primary or secondary, are hidden.
1.2: Hidden" images that are however visible (erection, wet clothing with visible nipple) are not allowed.
1.3: Images of children (defined as "able to stand") naked or in underwear are prohibited.
1.4: Pictures of breastfeeding mothers are allowed as long as the nipples are not visible or the person's anatomy is not further revealed.
1.5: Publishing works of art, whether "hand-drawn, digital or real" representing explicit sexual activity and any form of image or video related to pornography are prohibited.
1.6: Texts, images, audio or video content of shocking sexual acts intended to arouse arousal.
1.7: Sexual content involving minors, non-consensual relationships, or any reprehensible act, whether real or simulated.

2.1: Photos or videos that contain hateful symbols or speech.
2.2: Publications with captions that condone violence or attack a person for who they are.
2.3: Specific threats of bodily harm, theft or vandalism.

3.1: The acceptance of violence as a means of trying to change things
3.2: Content that attempts to provoke a climate of terror in public opinion or that undermines the strength of a government or group.
3.3: Contents that utter or incite the use of terror for ideological purposes.

4.1: Selling or buying a user account
4.2: Sale or purchase of controlled drugs and substances
4.3: Sale or purchase of music, album or playlist
4.5: Products made from endangered or protected species
4.8: Weapons, including firearms, ammunition and explosives, and instructions on how to make weapons (bombs, 3D printed firearms, etc.).

5.1: User accounts where it is reasonably verifiable that the child is under the age of 16.

6.1: Photos or videos showing extreme violence
6.2: Publications advocating violence or attacking a person because of their religion, ethnic origin or sexuality.
6.3: Direct threats of physical harm, theft, vandalism or financial loss.

7.1: Accounts that use the nickname or represent people or organizations they are not.

8.1: Publications encouraging or advocating self-harm, including suicide, scarification and eating disorders.
8.2: Comments identifying victims of self-harm if the content attacks or ridicules them.

9.1: The creation of a "fake profile" based on the first and last name of an existing person...
9.2: Disseminate "public" information about a user without his or her permission and any other information that has been modified or transformed.

TERMS-OF-USE.1-REGISTRATION-d:
Access to certain services is subject to user registration. Registration and access to the site's services are reserved exclusively for capable natural persons, who have completed and validated the registration form available online on the Piin's site, as well as these General Conditions of Use. registration, the user undertakes to provide exact, sincere and up-to-date information on his person and his civil status. The user will also have to regularly check the data concerning him in order to keep its accuracy.

The user must imperatively provide a valid e-mail address, on which the site will send him a confirmation of his registration for his services. An e-mail address cannot be used more than once to register for services through the same account. Only one registration for site services is allowed per natural person. The user is assigned an identifier allowing him to access a space to which access is reserved, in addition to entering his password. The identifier is unique for each user, however the password can be changed online by the user in his Personal Space.
The password is personal and confidential, the user undertakes not to communicate it to third parties. Piin’s reserves in any event, the possibility of refusing a request for subscriptions to the services in the event of non-compliance by the user with the provisions of these General Conditions of Use.
TERMS-OF-USE.2-UNSUBSCRIBE-d: The registered user can at any time request their unsubscription by going to the dedicated page in their personal space. Any unsubscription from the site will be effective, after the user has completed the form provided for this purpose, within the immediate period.
TERMS-OF-USE.3-DELETION-OF-PERSONAL-SPACE-d:
It is made known to the user that the editor reserves the right to delete the personal space of any user who violate the terms of use and particularly in the following cases:

● If the user makes a illegal use of the site
● If the user during the creation of personal space, voluntarily transmit incorrect information to the site
● If the user has not been active on his personal space for at least 5 years.

Dans case where the editor decides to remove the user's personal space for one of these reasons, it can not constitute a harm to the user whose account has been deleted. This deletion does not constitute a waiver of legal proceedings that the publisher may take against the user who has contravened these rules.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-plateform: Espace-Piin’s Inc. is an online media which offers to centralize several functionalities in it in an intuitive and free way for its users. For this, the media is a platform where users can chat and share content with other users. It also hosts a function to listen to music continuously, so that its users can soak up a good atmosphere whatever either the situation and the time. Espace-Piin’s Inc. also hosts a function to watch videos continuously to entertain and educate its users.
TERMS-OF-USE.Access-&-nav-d:
Access to and use of the site are reserved for adults. The publisher will have the right to request proof of the age of the user by any means. The editor implements the technical solutions at his disposal to allow access to the site 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. He can nevertheless at any time suspend, limit or interrupt access to the site or to certain pages of this in order to proceed with updates, modifications of its content or any other actions deemed necessary for the proper functioning of the site.
Connection and navigation on the Espace Piin's site constitute unreserved acceptance of these General Conditions of Use , whatever the technical means of access and the terminals used. These General Conditions of Use apply to any variation or extension of the site on existing or future social and / or community networks managed by Espace Piins Inc.
TERMS-OF-USE.Confidentiality-d: In addition to these Terms and Conditions, the site has a privacy policy which describes how personal data is processed when the user visits the site and how cookies are used. By browsing the site, the user also claims to have read the above privacy policy.
TERMS-OF-USE.Generality-d:
All access methods to the site "www.espace-piins.com" are subject to this privacy policy. Espace Piins Inc is responsible for the personal data collected on the platform. This concerns the use, storage, protection and dissemination of your personal information. Access to Espace Piins is completely free and all the functions of the platform (except the publication of advertising) are not billed.
The editor reserves the right to modify, at any time and without notice, the site and the services as well as these General Conditions of Use, in particular to adapt to new functionalities or the deletion or modification of existing functionalities in the purpose of improving the platform. It is therefore recommended that the user refer to the latest version of the General Conditions of Use before any navigation, accessible at any time on the site. In case of disagreement with the General Conditions of Use, no use of the site can be made by the user.
TERMS-OF-USE.Hyperlinks-d:
The site may contain hypertext links pointing to other websites over which Piin’s has no control. Despite the prior and regular verifications carried out by the publisher, the latter declines all responsibility for the content that it is possible to find on these sites. The publisher authorizes the establishment of hypertext links to any page or document of his site provided that the establishment of these links is not carried out for commercial or advertising purposes. In addition, the prior information of the publisher of the site is necessary before any establishment of hypertext link. Are excluded from this authorization sites disseminating information of an illegal, violent, controversial, pornographic, xenophobic nature or which may affect the sensitivity of the greatest number.
Finally, Piin’s reserves the right to have a hypertext link pointing to its site deleted at any time, if the site considers that it does not comply with its editorial policy. All hypertext external to the platform that is not suggested by the platform publisher is not recommended.
TERMS-OF-USE.Intellectual-property-d:
The structure of the site but also the texts, graphics, images, photographs, sounds, videos and computer applications that compose it are the property of the publisher and are protected as such by the laws in force under intellectual property.

Reproduction, adaptation or partial or total exploitation of the contents, registered trademarks and services offered by the site, by any process whatsoever, without the express prior written authorization of the publisher, are strictly prohibited and may constitute counterfeiting within the meaning of articles L.335-2 et seq. of the Intellectual Property Code. And this, with the exception of the elements expressly designated as free of rights on the site.

Access to the site does not constitute recognition of a right and, in general, does not confer any intellectual property right relating to an element of the site, which remain the exclusive property of the publisher. The user is prohibited from entering data on the site which would modify or which could modify its content or appearance.
TERMS-OF-USE.Responsability-d:
The publisher is only responsible for the content that he himself has edited. The publisher is not responsible for: 

● In the event of problems or technical, IT or accounting failures of the site with any hardware or software 
● Direct or indirect, material or immaterial, foreseeable or unpredictable damage resulting from the use or difficulties of using the site or its services 
● Intrinsic characteristics of the Internet, in particular those relating to the unreliability and the lack of security of the information circulating there 
● Illegal content or activities using its site without its having duly become aware of it within the meaning of the Law with regard to the processing of personal data.

Furthermore, the site cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, and the topicality of the information disseminated there.

The user is responsible for: 
● The protection of its equipment and its manipulation on the platform from a device not belonging to Espace Piins 
● The use he makes of the site or its data 
● If it does not respect the letter or the spirit of these general conditions of use.
TERMS-OF-USE.Responsability-d-extra: By providing content to the service, you grant Piin's a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, transferable sublicense transferable to use this content (including reproduce, distribute, prepare derivative works, the spread and run) in connection with the service and activities Piin's (and its successors and affiliates), including to promote and redistribute Service in whole or in part.
TERMS-OF-USE.Site-management-d:
For the proper management of the site, the publisher may at any time: 

● Suspend, interrupt or limit access to all or part of the site, reserve access to the site or to certain parts of the site, to a specific category of Internet users. 
● Delete all information that could disrupt its operation or that contravenes national or international laws, or the rules of Netiquette. 
● Suspend the site in order to carry out updates. Any desire to modify content on the platform will not be available during maintenance periods.

TERMS-OF-USE.Tips: We may give you a tip on how to make millions of dollars in our Terms of Service, so take the time to read them !
TERMS-OF-USE.About-definition-of-the-Tou:
1.1 The purpose of the present general terms of use (hereinafter referred to as "GTC") is to provide a legal framework for the terms and conditions for making the website and services of Wiin's Space Inc. available via Wiin's and to define the conditions of access and use of the services by the "user".

1.2 The use of the Wiin's website and Wiin's applications (iOS and Android) and all products, Wiin's Music, Wiin's Tube, Wiin's Story, including the audio and video player that may be integrated into them, are subject to these general terms of use.

1.3 This legally binding agreement between you and Wiin's Space Inc. includes (a) the terms and conditions set forth herein, (b) the Wiin's Community Rules available in the profile settings (collectively the "Community Rules").
TERMS-OF-USE.About-agreement-to-the-Tou:
2.1 All registrations or uses of the site imply the acceptance without any reserve or restriction of the present TOS by the user. When registering on the site via the registration form, each user expressly accepts the present TOS by checking the box preceding the following text: "I accept the terms of use".

2.2 You may use the Service and accept the TOS only if you are sixteen (16) years of age or older or if the laws of your country of residence or the country from which you access or use the Service permit you to receive and/or use the Service.

2.3 In case of non-acceptance of the TOS stipulated in this contract, the user must renounce access to the services offered by the site.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-modification-of-the-Tou: 3.1 Espace-Piin's Inc. reserves the right to periodically modify the TOS applicable to Wiin's, for example to adapt them to legislative and regulatory changes or to modify the functionalities offered as part of the service. The users will be informed each time these have been modified. In case of modification, the modified version of the TOS (the "Modified Terms") will be available via the service for each new modification. If the user does not agree to the "Amended Terms", the user must stop using the service. Continued use of the Service beyond the date of posting of the "Amended Terms" will constitute acceptance of the "Amended Terms.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-legal-information: 4.1 Wiin's is published by Espace-Piin's Inc, a joint stock company with a capital of €1, registered under the Quebec company number (NEQ) 1173147167, whose head office is located at :

TERMS-OF-USE.About-definitions:
𝗠𝗲𝗱𝗶𝗮 : The term media refers to any means of direct dissemination or by technical device allowing communication, either unilaterally (transmission of a message) or multilaterally through an exchange of information.

𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺 : A set of tools (software, hardware, operating systems, etc.) intended for the storage and sharing of virtual content (audio, video or other).

𝗔𝗿𝘁𝗶𝘀𝘁 : An artist is an individual who makes a work, cultivates or masters an art, a knowledge, a technique, and whose creativity, poetry, originality of his production, his acts, his gestures, etc., are noticed. His works are sources of emotions, feelings, reflections, spirituality or transcendence. For this project, an artist is a creator who shares his works with the company "Espace-Piin's Inc." and its community.

𝗦𝘂𝗯𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗶𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 : Contract with Wiin's that allows users to receive a regular service.

𝗦𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲 : Services are defined in article 6.1.

𝗦𝗶𝘁𝗲 : Site means the website https://www.wiins.io

𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗿 : The user refers to any person who uses the site or one of the services offered on the site.

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁 : The terms "User Content" refers to the data transmitted by the user in the various sections of the site.

𝗔𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁 : Content consumed one or more times by the same user in the same month (thirty days).

𝗔 𝗪𝗶𝗶𝗻'𝘀 : A Wiin's is a publication in the form of image, text, music or video.

𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴 : Refers to the simultaneous digital transmission of data via the Internet.

𝗨𝗽𝗹𝗼𝗮𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 : Refers to transmitting data from your computer to the Internet.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-access-to-the-site:
6.1 Wiin's website will be in early access from May 01, 2021 until January 01, 2022 at the latest. The functionalities will be restricted compared to the final version and will not take into account the remuneration of the artists. Nevertheless, users will have the possibility to make monetary gifts to artists on their Wiin's account.

6.2 The Wiin's website provides the user with access to the following services:

• Visibility and interactivity with the publications via the Wiin's Story menu. Popular publications as well as suggestions are visible via the Discovery menu which allows the user to take his first steps on the application. For more information please refer to the publishing process in the News Feed.

• Uploading of videos and remuneration according to the actual content consumed via the Wiin's Tube menu, a remuneration system will then be put in place to facilitate the remuneration of artists and those who participate in the creation of video content.

• Music listening, remuneration according to audience and monetary gifts via the Wiin's Music menu, a remuneration system will then be set up to facilitate the remuneration of artists and those who participate in the creation of audio content.

• Instant conversations between users via the Messenger space. The history is automatically erased on the fourteenth day after the sending.

6.3 The site is accessible thanks to a subscription service in authorized countries (Canada, France) ensuring the protection of the right holders, and to any user having an access to Internet. All costs incurred by the user to access the service (computer hardware, software, Internet connection, etc.) are at the user's expense.

6.4 The non-member user does not have access to the reserved services. To do so, they must register by filling out the registration form. By agreeing to register for the reserved services, the user agrees to provide his pseudonym, his e-mail address and his date of birth. Identification will also be requested during the account verification process.

6.5 The user is responsible for updating the information provided. He can modify them by logging into his member area.

6.6 To access the services, the user must identify himself with his user name and password, which he can freely choose when registering, and which are strictly personal. As such, he/she is forbidden to disclose them. Otherwise, he/she will remain solely responsible for the use that will be made of them.

6.7 The user may also request to unsubscribe by going to the dedicated page on his personal space or sending an email to: contact@wiins.io. This will be effective within 24 hours (twenty-four hours).

6.8 In case of non-compliance with the general terms and conditions of sale and/or use, Wiin's will have the possibility to suspend or even close a user's account, after a formal notice sent by electronic means and remaining without effect for more than forty-eight hours. For more information, the subscriber has the possibility to consult the community rules, accessible on the Wiin's website.

6.9 Any deletion of an account, for whatever reason, will result in the deletion of all personal information of the user.

6.10 Wiin's is not responsible for any event due to force majeure that results in a malfunction of the site or server, and subject to any interruption or modification in case of maintenance. In these cases, the user agrees not to hold the editor responsible for any interruption or suspension of service, even without notice. The user has the possibility to contact the site by email at the email address of the publisher communicated in ARTICLE 1.

6.11 Wiin's users can use the artists' contents for non-profit purposes, but also for profit. The artists will be paid in return.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-payment-confirmation-unsubscribe:
7.1 The user must have a subscription in order to access the various functionalities. In accordance with the legal provisions of the article relating to the subscription by default, the user must follow a series of steps to conclude the contract by electronic means in order to be able to carry out his subscription: indication of the essential details of the user (identification, email) and acceptance of the present GTU. The confirmation of the order will lead to the formation of the contract. The user will receive by e-mail the confirmation of the order and the payment, as well as an invoice if the amount exceeds fifty Canadian dollars.

7.2 During the ordering process, the User will have the possibility to identify and correct any errors in the data entry. The default language for the conclusion of the contract is English, with the possibility of changing it to French.

7.3 The archiving of communications, registration details and invoices is carried out on a reliable and durable medium so as to constitute a faithful and durable copy. This information can be produced as proof of the contract.

7.4 Any person who publishes content has to make sure that he has all the necessary user agreements and that in no case Wiin's will be held responsible for a breach of the right of synchronization.

7.5 Case of independent users/page managers:
The user or the page manager(s), by verifying and certifying their profile and/or page, certify(s) as correct and up to date the information given in their registration(s). Wiin's is not responsible for and is not in a position to arbitrate disputes relating to copyright ownership. Therefore, it is up to the parties involved to settle the dispute in court. The user or the page manager(s) authorize(s) Wiin's to distribute the content published by them in return for payment and are responsible for the payment and distribution of the royalties generated by these publications to the rightful owners.

7.6 Case of users/managers of pages protected by a rights manager:
The user or the manager(s) of the page, by verifying and certifying their profile and/or page, certify(s) as accurate and up to date the information provided at the time of their registration(s). Wiin's is not responsible for and is not in a position to arbitrate disputes relating to copyright ownership. Therefore, it is up to the parties involved to settle the dispute in court. Wiin's commits itself to pay the benefits of the mechanical right to the user or the operator(s) of the page. The profits of the other rights (copyright, reproduction rights...) will be given to the right manager who will manage the distribution of the profits between the right holders.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-price:
8.1 The subscription for registration consists of three offers, one of which is still to come. The subscription is monthly. Any month started is due. If the user has taken out a subscription for several months but terminates the contract before the end of the term, a fee of 10% will be charged on the sum of the refunds required.
At the end of the corresponding period and in the absence of notification of refusal by the user, the package will be tacitly renewed for an indefinite period for the sum of X$ per month. (rate in reflection)
Prices are expressed in the currency of the consumer's country. The payment requested from the user corresponds to the total time of purchase.
The access to the functionalities will be immediate, that is to say immediately after the validation of the payment.

8.2 Terms of payment: The subscription assumes that the user pays the amount of the package described above.
Payment for access to the mobile application is made via a crypto-currency payment service.
Upon completion of the payment, the user will receive an e-mail message attesting to the validation of the payment and access to the features.
In case of a payment incident, the user will not have access to any Wiin's services.

8.3 The order: The order is composed of 4 steps:
The selection of the subscription type: Personal, Professional,
Choice of the duration of the subscription,
Payment of the order,
Access to the functionalities after effective payment.

8.4 Summary: The user can view the details of his order and its total price. The contract will be concluded, in application of the provisions of the Civil Code, from the validation click, subject to an effective payment, by which the customer confirms his order after having been put in a position to correct it.

8.5 Payments via mobiles, tablets, computers (MAC etc...): The user acknowledges having read and accepted the terms and conditions of the crypto-currency at the time of payment. Payment processing and billing is subject to the terms, conditions and privacy policy of the crypto-currency. Wiin's will not be held responsible for any errors in the crypto-currency payment process.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-unsubscribe:
9.1 The user may terminate his initial commitment as well as the renewal of his package at any time, by e-mail to contact@wiins.io without giving any reason.
The user must indicate in the subject line of the e-mail that it is a request for termination.
As far as the cancellation of the initial contract is concerned, the user will be reimbursed for the period remaining until the end of the contract, except if the cancellation is based on a fault committed by Espace-Piin's Inc.
If the contract is executed within the framework of a tacit renewal, the cancellation request made for the current month will be valid for the following month.
Without prejudice to the other provisions of the present contract, in case of default by the user, Espace-Piin's Inc. reserves the right to terminate the member's account without prior notice.
The termination will not result in a refund of the current month.
Upon request to contact@wiins.io, Espace-Piin's Inc. will indicate the breach(s) by email.
This termination will be done without notice. Espace-Piin's Inc. may claim damages from users or their legal representatives in compensation for any prejudice suffered by Espace-Piin's Inc. or the latter as a result of such breaches, subject to the legal provisions in force.
The user's data will be deleted at their request and upon termination of the user's account, except in the case where a user is the subject of a complaint made by a rightful owner or another user.

9.2 Cooling off period: For any registration with Wiin's, the user may change his mind for any reason and receive a pro rata refund for the period of use, minus the artists' share of the remuneration, within fourteen (14) days after the date of registration for the relevant service (the "Cooling off Period") according to the following: User authorizes Wiin's to automatically bill him/her each month until termination. The user agrees that the Cooling Off Period is fourteen (14) days after his purchase,
The cooling off period is no longer valid once the user is "verified" during this period.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-price-early-access:
𝗗𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗹𝘆 𝗮𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗱, 𝗻𝗼 𝗽𝗮𝘆𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝘄𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗯𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝗾𝘂𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘀. 𝗟𝗶𝗸𝗲𝘄𝗶𝘀𝗲, 𝗻𝗼 𝗿𝗲𝗺𝘂𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘄𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗯𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗱𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗶𝘀𝘁𝘀.
𝗔𝗻 𝘂𝗽𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗺𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝘂𝘀𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗯𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗱𝗲 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗻 𝗮 𝘀𝘂𝗯𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗶𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗶𝘀 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗲𝗱. 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗯𝗲 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗲𝗱 𝗯𝗲𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗲𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗱.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-personal-information:
11.1 The site ensures that the user's personal information is collected and processed with respect for privacy. In accordance with the French Data Protection Act, the user has the right to access, rectify, delete and oppose his or her personal data. The user exercises this right: 

• By e-mail
• Via a contact form
• Via his personal space

Wiin's commits itself not to use the personal data of the users for commercial purposes. No personal data will be communicated to external partners except in the case of a legal procedure.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-intellectual-property-rights: 12.1 Copyright in the Work (Copyright Act R.S.C. (1985), c. C-42) includes the exclusive right to produce or reproduce the work or a substantial part thereof in any material form, to perform or represent the work or a substantial part thereof in public and, if the work is unpublished, to publish the work or a substantial part thereof, and the exclusive right to produce, reproduce, represent or publish a translation of the work.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-responsibility:
13.1 The sources of the information published on the Wiin's site are deemed reliable but the site does not guarantee that it is free of defects, errors or omissions. The information communicated is presented for information purposes only and has no contractual value. In spite of regular updates, Wiin's site cannot be held responsible for any modification of administrative and legal provisions occurring after publication. Likewise, the site cannot be held responsible for the use and interpretation of the information contained in this site.

13.2 The user is responsible for keeping the password secret. Any disclosure of the password, in whatever form, is prohibited. The user assumes all risks related to the use of his login and password. The site declines all responsibility.

13.3 The Wiin's site cannot be held responsible for possible viruses that could infect the computer or any computer equipment of the Internet user, following use, access or downloading from the site.

13.4 The responsibility of the site cannot be engaged in case of force majeure or the unforeseeable and insurmountable fact of a third party.

13.5 The users/managers of independent pages are responsible for the payment and distribution of the royalties generated by their publications to the rightful owners.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-hypertext-links: 14.1 Hypertext links can be present on the site. The user is informed that by clicking on these links he will leave the Wiin's site. Wiin's has no control over the web pages to which these links lead and can in no case be held responsible for their content.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-publication-by-user:
15.1 The site allows users to publish: personal works, comments under articles, images, videos, music. In his publications, the user agrees to respect the rules of Netiquette (rules of good conduct of the Internet) and the rules of law in force. The site may exercise moderation on the publications and reserves the right to delete one or more contents by providing a justification to the member(s). The user remains the owner of all his intellectual property rights. However, by publishing on the site, he/she gives Espace Piin's Inc. the non-exclusive and free right to represent, diffuse and distribute his/her publication, directly or through an authorized third party, throughout the world, on any medium (digital or physical), for the duration of the intellectual property. The user gives up the right to use his publication on the Internet and on cell phone networks. Espace Piin's Inc. commits to display the user's pseudonym near each use of his publication.

15.2 All content put online by the user is his sole responsibility. The user undertakes not to put online any content that could harm the interests of third parties. Any legal action taken by an injured third party against the site will be borne by the user. The user's content can be removed or modified by the site at any time without notice.
TERMS-OF-USE.About-applicable-law-and-jurisdiction:
16.1 The laws of Canada shall apply to this Agreement. In the event of failure to resolve a dispute between the parties amicably, the Canadian courts will have exclusive jurisdiction to hear the matter.

For any question relating to the application of the present GCU, you can contact the editor at the coordinates listed in ARTICLE 1.
TERMS-OF-USE.Maybe-w-give-u-a-tip: Maybe we give you a tip on how to make millions of dollars in our « GTU », so take the time to read it.
TERMS-OF-USE.Definition-of-the-Tou: Definition of the term of use

TEMPORARY.Why-this-early-access: Why this early access? Wiin’s wants to revolutionize the relationship you have with your phone. Also, we need your help in order to improve our services and offer you an exclusive experience that will be completely free during this period. In addition, as the first Wiinser, you will benefit from a reduction on your future subscription.
TEMPORARY.W-does-early-access-offer: What does early access offer ? Early Access allows you to use all of Wiin's currently available features. We'll leave it to you to discover more through the video, if you haven't already.
TEMPORARY.H-lg-ll-t-platform-be-in-early-access: How long will the platform be in early access? For 9 months, or maybe 6, or 3. You have your part to play !! But it’s certain until January 1, 2022, at the latest.
TEMPORARY.H-ll-t-full-version-b-diff-frm-t-early-a: How will the full version be different from the early access version? The platform will be improved according to your requests, which you can formulate on the menu "propose an improvement". The artists will also be able to receive a remuneration worthy of their talent. That being said, the free privilege on Wiin’s will expire. Follow us on social networks to stay informed.
TEMPORARY.H-much-ll-t-full-version-cost-after-Earl: How much will the full version cost after Early Access? The price is to be announced. The early access will allow us to offer you our services at the best price. You will be informed of this before paying, of course.
TEMPORARY.H-d-y-plan-to-involve-t-community-in-t-d: How do you plan to involve the community in the development process ? Simply by using it. We will be happy to hear that you want to support ! Please feel free to share your experience because after all, it is also your platform. As much as we really appreciate your ideas and feedback, you can also participate in the development of Wiin's by making a donation.
TEMPORARY.On-first-may-d: On the first of May, you will have early access to our services. While waiting for this great revolution, you will have to be patient! Please note, this access will be available for the first 1000 registrations.
